hero.title: The Ultimate Intelligence Layer for Gemini CLI
hero.subtitle: Unlock the full power of Gemini v0.26 with advanced agents, lifecycle hooks, and the Conductor protocol for elite engineering.

agents.title: Autonomous Agents
agents.desc: Native integration with codebase_investigator and cli_help for deep repository analysis.

hooks.title: Lifecycle Hooks
hooks.desc: Automated session management with start triggers and post-tool validation hooks.

conductor.title: Conductor Protocol
conductor.desc: Structured track management and execution plans for complex software projects.

v26.title: v0.26 Optimized
v26.desc: Experimental Plan flags, enhanced security consent, and optimized agent configurations.

community.title: The Future of AI Engineering
community.text: Gemini Elite Core is an open-source movement to redefine how developers interact with AI in the terminal. Join us in building the next frontier.
